title: FREE RENT! Beautiful single in the heart of San Fernando Valley!
posting_body: *All information deemed reliable but not guaranteed.
Advertised rent is net pricing of the unit when factoring in ½ of 2nd month free on a 12month lease.
Actual rent paid to landlord is $1,595/month.*
Stephanie | North Oak Real Estate Inv., Inc.
**THIS UNIT IS BEING ADVERTISED BY NORTH OAK'S MAIN OFFICE.
FOR A QUICKER RESPONSE, PLEASE CONTACT ONSITE MANAGER DIRECTLY**
Great Experiences Just Around the Corner!
Pets Policy: Small pets allowed with additional deposit and pet rent.
Centrally located in the San Fernando Valley with easy access to Topanga Canyon, the Orange Line, 101 and 405 Freeways.
Close proximity to Pierce College and other schools.
Minutes away from Westfield Topanga Mall.
Call us today & schedule an appointment to view your next home!
North Oak Real Estate Inv., Inc.
